title: Elegant Duplex in Zamosc's Historic Stare Miasto – Perfect for Modern Families and Entrepreneurs
description: Welcome to this beautifully presented 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex in the heart of Stare Miasto, Zamosc. Featuring a spacious layout of 162 sqm, this energy-efficient home offers abundant natural light and airy interiors. The ground floor seamlessly connects the modern kitchen and living area to a tranquil garden space through patio doors, perfect for family gatherings and relaxation. Thoughtfully designed built-in wardrobes and air conditioning throughout the property add modern comfort, while the private garden provides a lush outdoor retreat.
neighborhood_description: Stare Miasto is renowned for its unique blend of historic charm and modern conveniences. With easy access to public transport and highways, entrepreneurs and families enjoy both connectivity and calm in this vibrant district. Charming cobblestone streets and architectural landmarks are complemented by quality cafés and local businesses.
lifestyle_benefits: Spacious private garden for family entertainment
Modern amenities set within a historical setting
Convenient access to transport and Zamosc’s business district
target_buyer: Dynamic families or entrepreneurs seeking space to grow a business and a family in a community rich in history and convenient to local amenities.
market_positioning: This duplex stands out as a unique home-office solution, combining heritage surroundings with contemporary finishes to attract professionals and families that want style, efficiency, and prime city access within Zamosc.
